MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth, affecting properties in Aberhosan and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.51PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.50PM on 20th October 2020.
